issue.title: For disconnected cluster pod postgres-0  is stuck on 'Pending' state
issue.body:
Run details:

URL: https://reportportal-ocs4.apps.ocp-c1.prod.psi.redhat.com/ui/#ocs/launches/362/8465/375692/375703/375704/log
Run ID: 1674231409  
ODF Build: 4.12.0-167
OCP Version: 4.12

Failure Details:

```
Message: ocs_ci.ocs.exceptions.TimeoutExpiredError: Timed out after 3600s running get("", True, "app=postgres")
Type: None


Text:
self = <test_pgsql_pvc_clone.TestPvcCloneOfWorkloads object at 0x7fda85527f10>
pgsql_factory_fixture = <function pgsql_factory_fixture..factory at 0x7fda665ba0d0>
pvc_clone_factory = <function pvc_clone_factory_fixture..factory at 0x7fda66756820>
pgsql_teardown = None


@skipif_ocs_version("<4.6")
@skipif_ocp_version("<4.6")
@pytest.mark.polarion_id("OCS-2342")
def test_pvc_clone(self, pgsql_factory_fixture, pvc_clone_factory, pgsql_teardown):
    """
    1. Deploy PGSQL workload
    2. Create multiple clone of same PVC when the PVC usage is different
    3. Attach a new pgsql pod to it.
    4. Create pgbench benchmark to new pgsql pod
    """
    pgsql_teardown

    # Deploy PGSQL workload
    log.info("Deploying pgsql workloads")

  pgsql = pgsql_factory_fixture(replicas=1)

tests/e2e/lifecycle/pvc_clone/test_pgsql_pvc_clone.py:139: 



tests/conftest.py:3006: in factory
    pgsql.setup_postgresql(replicas=replicas, sc_name=sc_name)
ocs_ci/ocs/pgsql.py:90: in setup_postgresql
    self.pod_obj.wait_for_resource(
ocs_ci/ocs/ocp.py:729: in wait_for_resource
    raise (ex)
ocs_ci/ocs/ocp.py:619: in wait_for_resource
    for sample in TimeoutSampler(



self = <ocs_ci.utility.utils.TimeoutSampler object at 0x7fda7f8a2340>


def __iter__(self):
    if self.start_time is None:
        self.start_time = time.time()
    while True:
        self.last_sample_time = time.time()
        if self.timeout <= (self.last_sample_time - self.start_time):

          raise self.timeout_exc_cls(*self.timeout_exc_args)
E               ocs_ci.ocs.exceptions.TimeoutExpiredError: Timed out after 3600s running get("", True, "app=postgres")



ocs_ci/utility/utils.py:1176: TimeoutExpiredError

```

comment.body:
Pgsql: Similar issue for test_pvc_clone as it is trying to pull the mirrored image of pgsql and failing

2023-10-08 01:42:49,416 - ThreadPoolExecutor-21_0 - INFO - ocs_ci.utility.utils.exec_cmd.622 - Executing command: podman login --authfile /tmp/authfile_roou_bbo ocs-qe-proxy-dc-eco.usersys.redhat.com:5000 -u ***** -p ***** --tls-verify=false
2023-10-08 01:42:49,726 - ThreadPoolExecutor-21_0 - INFO - ocs_ci.utility.utils.exec_cmd.622 - Executing command: podman image pull quay.io/rhceph-dev/ocs-must-gather:latest-4.14 --authfile /tmp/authfile_roou_bbo
